content: this listing is for an attractive men s or unisex scarf crochet pattern finished size scarf is about 8-1/2 x 74 21 x 188 cm this doesn t include fringe the pattern uses crochet us terms free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/scarf-men-crochet-pattern/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
